content: Does anyone know how the last two columns in the FEMA XLS template are calculated? Are they calculated from values in the same row? I'm trying to go from MeasureReport to CSV but the FEMA MeasureReport does not contain the the percent values.

Does the following make sense?

  • column I = positiveIncrease / totalTestResultsIncrease
  • column J = positive / (totalTestResults - rejected)

Chris Turczynskyj said:

Does the following make sense?

  • column I = positiveIncrease / totalTestResultsIncrease
  • column J = positive / (totalTestResults - rejected)

It states that it is a percent so multiply result x100
